exp.libs.algorithm._3rd.opt_bin
类 BinTree

java.lang.Object
  exp.libs.algorithm._3rd.opt_bin.BinTree
所有已实现的接口：
DrawingObj
public class BinTree
extends Object
implements DrawingObj

The BinTree class provides the utilities to draw a complete binary tree on the corresponding graphical context. It also contains some animation methods used in heap sort, priority queue and sorting using priority queue

There are basically 4 types of graphical objects: input, output, tree representation of heap, and array representation of heap. The Node class is used to store the graphical objects.

另请参见：
Node

构造方法详细信息

BinTree

public BinTree(exp.libs.algorithm._3rd.opt_bin.OBSAnim obsAnim,
               DrawingPanel drawingPanel,
               int max_size)
Create a new heap and pre-calculate the location of each node given the maximum number of node passed in as the parameter.

参数：
drawingPanel - The drawing panel where the heap is to be drawn.
max_size - The maximum number of nodes in the heap.
方法详细信息

redraw

public void redraw()
Repaints the drawing panel and delay.

initBinTree

public void initBinTree()
Re-initialize the heap. This method is called when the animation is re-started.

setBinTree

public void setBinTree(int[] a)
Re-assign the heap using the array of weights passed in as the parameter.

参数：
a - Array of weight for the newly re-assigned heap.

Re-assign the weight of node i according to the parameters.

参数：

val - The new weight to be set.

drawArrow

public void drawArrow(Graphics g,
                      Point[] points)
Draw an arrowed line segment using the array of points.

参数：
g - Graphical context
points - The vortices of the line segment. An arrow head will be drawn using the last point in the array at the tip.

                          int x,

Draw a node of the array representation of the heap.

参数：
g - Graphical context
x - The x coordinate of the top left corner of the node
y - The y coordinate of the top left corner of the node
node - The node to be drawn

moveNode

public void moveNode(Node node,
                     int dx,
                     int dy)
Move the tree starting with node dx pixels to the right and dy pixels down.

参数：
node - The root node of the tree to be moved.
dx - The change in x direction.
dy - The change in y direction.

public void move(int x,
                 int y)
从接口 DrawingObj 复制的描述

指定者：
接口 DrawingObj 中的 move
参数：
x - The x coordinate of the drawing object's new position.
